StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [RemoveNwaLinkFromProspect]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@NwaID int AS BEGIN
DECLARE @ProspectID uniqueiden..er
SELECT @ProspectID = ProspectId FROM Prospec.ng.USMC.Prospect WHERE NwaId = ( SELECT rowguid FROM MCRISS.dbo.nwa WHERE NWA_ID = @NwaID )
IF @ProspectID IS NOT NULL BEGIN UPDATE Prospec.ng.USMC.Prospect SET NwaId = NULL WHERE ProspectId = @ProspectID END
END
